Manufacturer CENOVE

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:23:47 UTC – Details)

From the brand

With more than 6 years experience in designing and manufacturing toys,CENOVE was founded in 2017.With over 1 million customers in more than 100 countries and regions around the world.We are a young team full of passion & dreams.We are committed to toy. Wish all of the children have a happy childhood.

Safety Toddler Toy:CENOVE pretend flower garden toy set is made with Eco-friendly materials. BPA-Free,Non-toxic, No smell.Smooth surface,won’t hurt kids’ hands.Meet with ASTM F963-16/-17 and CPSIA safety standards.
Easy to Clean & Organizer: Comes with a nice green carry box to organizer. All parts could be washed with water. It also could be washed in a dish washer.
Educational Tool: Learning about the parts of a plant. Bright, colorful STEM garden toys help hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.
Cool Toys Gifts for 3 4 5 6 7 Years Old Girls and Boys:Best gifts for birthday,Children’s Day,Christmas,Easter,Summer camp activities.
Creative Development:This build a bouquet craft kits allow young children to build, match and sort. They can mix and match pieces to create different flowers at will.Flower Set provides children with realistic early STEM support skills

CENOVE Build a Bouquet Floral Arrangement Playset

  • It develop the sense of beauty and creativity. Plus it’s just fun to put these flowers, stems, leaves and bases together. It is a simple but fun toy.

  • The lilies, daisies, morning glory, plum blossom, orchid, hibiscus and murraya paniculata easy-to-stack in the assorted stems for limitless fun that blossoms in all seasons. It is not only building toys for kids ages 3-6, but also it can be used for room decoration.

Safty and Durable

  • BPA-free & without coating. All parts are made of high-quality, harmless and non-toxic PP plastic.

Toddler Learning Toys

  • Help pre-school children learning about the parts of a plant.
  • With a variety of petals and leaves, children can create different flower combinations. They can play for hours without getting bored. Perfect gifts for kids.

Cute Garden Toy

  • It is not only a fun toy for indoors, but the children can also play with the flower toy in the garden. It helps to improve the eye-hand coordination of the children and cultivate the flower knowledge.

Read more

  • Package:1* Gift Box
  • 8*bases
  • 52*stem and leaf sections
  • 34* flower piece
  • 34 Stamens
  • 2*flower pot

Building Toy with Pink Box
Builidng Toy with Green Box

Product Description

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 20, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ JACMEL
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B9CH1P12

Standout Style: Unique shaker necklace design adds a magical dash to any outfit with a fun, colorful way to celebrate July birthdays
Superb Silver Plating: Exquisitely crafted with an appealing silver plated finish, topped by Minnie’s signature red and white bow; includes adjustable 18″ chain with a 2″ extender and secure lobster clasp closure
Ready to Gift: Delivered in an authentic Disney gift box, the pretty birthstone shaker pendant necklace makes the perfect present for bridesmaids, birthdays, Sweet 16s, graduations, Valentine’s Day, anniversaries, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Easter, or any occasion
Dedicated to Quality & Style: Founded in 1977, New York-based SallyRose, a premier designer and curator of cross-generational and timeless brands, offers an array of affordable, yet always finely crafted on-trend and classic jewelry as well as gift items for the entire family

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

onlineCalendar,

);
}

Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180° flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180° flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180° to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop children’s intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

【Upgraded Toddler Cell Phone】Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
【180° Flip Camera】Upgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
【Powerful Battery Life】Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
【Safe & Durable Shockproof】This toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for children’s skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
【Great Gift for Kids】Perfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180° flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative play—the drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!


New Sprouts Fix It!

item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



【Create Your Own Magic Cottage】:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
【A kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM】:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
【Fairy Gardens Craft Kit】:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
【Start Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage】: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
【Unique Gifts for Kids】:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

CDE has its own factory with over 10 years professional experience and lots of jewelry technology patents.

MAINTENANCE INSTRUCTION

Keep your jewelry in your CDE box at the end of the day.

Do not spray perfume directly on the jewelry

Do not immerse your jewelry in liquid.

After wearing the necklace, wipe it with a soft flannel cloth before putting them away.

Minor tarnish can be lightly buffed off with a jewelry polishing cloth(you can find the cloth in the gift box) or a mild jewelry cleaner.
